name: Rumble in the Jungle
description:
It's time for the annual big fight - the square off between predators and prey. Let's get ready to rumble.

Click to select conversation options and to progress dialogue.

***

Made over the course of two days at GAMERella, Nov 9th-10th, working with the theme "rumble." It's weird, short and (unavoidably) a little rushed, but I had fun working on it.
